name: matrix-game
description: Matrix-inspired multiplayer text-based game server with RanvierMUD architecture and MCP interfaces

scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:bundles && npm run copy:manifests
scripts.copy:manifests: for bundle in bundles/*/; do bundle_name=$(basename "$bundle"); mkdir -p "dist/bundles/$bundle_name"; [ -f "$bundle/manifest.json" ] && cp "$bundle/manifest.json" "dist/bundles/$bundle_name/"; done && rm -f dist/bundles/core && ln -sf ../core dist/bundles/core
